title: The Best Hulk Film By Far
review: Not sure why some reviewers are giving this negative responses as this is, by far, the best Hulk representation to date.Eric Bana was first (movie) but emotionless and Mark Ruffalo had more estrogen than the Scarlet Witch. The worst miscasting of all. Wow. Can you possibly get it more wrong?At the time, Norton was surprised not to have been offered the role for the Avengers movie and critics and fans were (and still are) surprised that he was not.

title: Wow. What a disappointment.
review: I was excited to see this come out on video. Well, never going to get those 2 hours back. A good first half of the movie, but all downhill from there. Nothing believable happens for the rest of the movie, nor is it explainable or plausible. Please explain the rest of the movie to me? Ugh. Could have been fun.
